Articles.Content:
Hello, Is it just me or are the fuel transfer buttons gone when selecting two tanks? - Or do the tanks need to have a fuel transporting connection (nowadays)?

Edited October 23, 2015 by paul23

The ability to transfer fuel is tied to career mode-- you have to have upgraded the science facility, IIRC.

Go to your KSC view-- what level is your science facility? If it's entry-level, hover the mouse over the "upgrade" button and see what it tells you you'll get. I believe "resource transfer" shows up in that list.
oh, that's still a long way out then. Thanks for the reply .

Hello, Is it just me or are the fuel transfer buttons gone when selecting two tanks? - Or do the tanks need to have a fuel transporting connection (nowadays)?

It's not actually limited to having just 2 tanks selected. I do multi-tank transfers all the time.

Select a bunch of tanks then press the in or out button on one of them.

If you're transferring into that tank it will draw from all the other ones selected. If you're transferring from that tank it will split it among the other selected tanks.
